items.title: Book Review: Buffett’s Early Investments
items.description: This book digs into Buffett’s pre-Berkshire investments. The result is a fresh look into the origins of his investment approach.

items.title: The Alternative View: 401(k) Plans Are Better off Without Private Investments
items.description: The debate over the inclusion of private investments in 401(k) plans is a hot topic. Are DC plans better off without them?

items.title: ML Models Need Better Training Data: The GenAI Solution
items.description: As complex ML models become more prevalent in investment management, their tendency to overfit to specific historical conditions poses a growing risk ...

items.title: 6 Reasons to Avoid Hedge Funds
items.description: Financial success depends on disciplined saving and investing, not fancy investment products and high returns.

items.title: Decades in a Week: Germany’s Fiscal Breakthrough and Its Global Impact
items.description: Does Germany's massive fiscal package mark the beginning of a lasting regime change or just another chapter in market volatility?
